newsitem.title: USA: Wall Street stocks seen steady at open.
newsitem.headline: Wall Street stocks seen steady at open.

text.p: Wall Street shares are expected to open steady to modestly firmer on Monday, with a stream of second quarter earnings releases giving direction to the broader stock market in the absence of economic data.
"We're now in full earnings season, so the market will obviously pay pretty close attention to earnings reports through the week," Peter Cardillo, director of research at Westfalia Investments said.
Analysts said the stock market was looking to earnings reports to find the positive sentiment necessary to propel the Dow Jones Industrial average above the closely-watched 8,000 level.
The Dow closed up 35.06 ponts at 7,921.82 on Friday.
